com.thales.dis.mobile.idcloud.auth.ui.pin

Class SecurePinPad

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thales.dis.mobile.idcloud.auth.ui.pin.SecurePinPad

  • public abstract class SecurePinPad
extends Object
    A class that contains secure PIN pad UI implementation.

    Developer should call getFragment() to obtain the fragment and show it to the user.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SecurePinPad.Callback
      A callback that contains methods for managing PIN pad UI.
